title: How many songs did The Beatles write? - Quora

response.answer_text: 185, by my count. Thanks.

Wikipedia lists 237 songs written by The Beatles. But, I just read Mark Lewisohn’s “Complete Beatles” chronicle, and Allen J. Wiener’s “ultimate recording guide,” which lists virtually every song they ever did. Let me tell you that there are many songs that were never released! So, if you count them - how many would there be. There also TONS of solo songs by McCartney, Lennon, Harrison and even Ringo that were recorded but not released. There are FILMS that were shot and never released - all kinds of scripts that were ordered, written, and never saw the light of day. I think you will find most artists have works they don’t release because they don’t like them, never finished them, etc. So many unfinished little gems of history waiting to be discovered some day …
